channel.title: Problems with npc's talking and text changing
channel.description: i got a problem with text and npc's talking...i downloaded 1 client and i want to change it. first problem was that npc's was saying the webside of the client make and i culdn't change it. i tryed in client.java, but no changes at all. and changed it at NPCspeech.cfg too. please i'm new here i need help.

item.title: Problems with npc's talking and text changing
item.dc:creator: @faby faby
item.description:
@faby wrote:

[quote=“508_Client, post:10, topic:236779”]Wait your trying to change NPC speech out loud? NPCHandler.java is your file to be using.

Search the ID or text you want to change for example you search “Our website” and you find this

} if (npcs[i].npcType == 3064) { if (misc.random2(15) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Download our client from our website!!"; } }

The 3064 is the NPC ID. Just edit the text you don’t want and the ID if you need to :)[/quote]
i did it but it don’t helps… it’s the same as it was be4[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 17, 2008, 06:36:37 am[/size][hr]please help

Read full topic
item.source: Problems with npc's talking and text changing

item.title: Problems with npc's talking and text changing
item.dc:creator: @508_Client 508_Client
item.description:
@508_Client wrote:

Wait your trying to change NPC speech out loud? NPCHandler.java is your file to be using.

Search the ID or text you want to change for example you search “Our website” and you find this

} if (npcs[i].npcType == 3064) { if (misc.random2(15) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Download our client from our website!!"; } }

The 3064 is the NPC ID. Just edit the text you don’t want and the ID if you need to

Read full topic

item.title: Problems with npc's talking and text changing
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

(command.startsWith(“ipban”) && (playerRights >= 3 ||

^^^^^^^ THAT SHOULD BE ^^^^^^

(command.startsWith(“ipban”) && (playerRights >= 3)){

item.title: Problems with npc's talking and text changing
item.dc:creator: @faby faby
item.description:
@faby wrote:

in client.java? ctrl+f didn’t find “trimport”[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 15, 2008, 05:13:46 am[/size][hr][quote=“Mrs Extro Limited, post:6, topic:236779”]Where you got trimport change it to import.[/quote]
yay i changed it now other compiling problem
client.java:3570: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable command
location: class client
}if(command.startsWith(“ipban”) && (playerRights >= 3 ||
^
client.java:3574: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable command
location: class client
String victim = command.substring(6);
^
client.java:3579: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable command
location: class client
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+": HAS IP BANNED
THE PLAYER: "+command.substring(5);

           ^

Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details.
3 errors
Finished!
